attributes.action: Change the law and make it an offence to drive with side lights only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is as a result of seeing other drivers in bad weather or dusk driving on just side lights. In wet weather and sray you cannot see other vehicles in your mirrors, especially as most cars now seem to be silver in colour and just blend in with the spray.

Some other countries and provinces of Canada make it law that dipped headlights are used at all times, this could be a solution but a little extreme.

Please sign this petition to change the law and help make driving safer.
